articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: ‘The game’s gone’ - Ampadu's red card for stamp on Bernardeschi in Italy vs Wales provokes split reaction - Goal India
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America will be split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group will advance to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicks off with the quarterfinals.

articles.author: Edward Helmore
articles.title: ‘Two Americas’ may emerge as Delta variant spreads and vaccination rates drop - The Guardian
articles.description: Biden’s 70% vaccination target by Fourth of July likely to fall short as efforts to entice people to get shots have lost their initial impact
articles.content:

articles.author: sport
articles.title: Louis Oosthuizen's stunning 52-foot eagle putt hands him share of US Open lead - News24
articles.description: South Africa's Louis Oosthuizen closed with a stunning 52-foot eagle putt to grab a share of the lead with Canada's Mackenzie Hughes and American Russell Henley after the third round of the US Open.
articles.content: South Africa's Louis Oosthuizen closed with a stunning 52-foot eagle putt to grab a share of the lead with Canada's Mackenzie Hughes and American Russell Henley after Saturday's dramatic third round … [+6588 chars]
